name: Numeric Fiddle Thinkpiece© series : Freehugs
description:
At first I wanted to call this series "Numeric Graphite Thinkpiece", but what the hell are NGTs even? So graphite became fiddle. Fiddle is synonym for doodle. NFT. Done.

As far as thinkpiece goes, it's quite the opposite. This is the kind of stuff that comes out when I let myself draw aimlessly. With this piece, I ask this question: are we disguted by our own hatred of love and care?

Enjoy!
